articles.author: Isaac Schultz
articles.title: Hedge Fund Billionaire Brings $44.6M Jurassic Giant to American Museum of Natural History - Gizmodo
articles.description: The specimen is especially big and superlatively complete, and could clue researchers into the ancient beast's growth rate and metabolism.
articles.content:
New stegosaurus just droppednot literally, thank gosh, as that’d be a $44.6 million disaster.
The stegosaurus is dubbed Apex. It was found near Dinosaur, Colorado, in 2022 and was bought for that re… [+3197 chars]

articles.author: Lauren J. Young
articles.title: Bird Flu Virus Is One Mutation Away from Binding More Efficiently to Human Cells - Scientific American
articles.description: A new study finds tweaking part of the H5N1 virus infecting dairy cows in a single spot could allow it to better attach to human cell receptors, raising concerns it could transmit more easily between people
articles.content: Scientists have discovered that H5N1, the strain of highly pathogenic avian influenza virus currently spreading in U.S. dairy cows, only needs a single mutation to readily latch on to human cells fou… [+6948 chars]
